modName: Hazel. A Standalone Nord Follower With Vanilla Voices Friend And Friend
summary: A Vanilla Follower With Vanilla Voices, oh yeah. And a redguard.
descriptionHtml:
[b](This is my first mod and i'm not sure if i've broken any rules, so if I have please message me first before you delete this, i'll fix it :)[/b]

My First Mod, please tell me if I need to improve on something and please don't be a jerk. 

[b]Description: [/b]

Hazel is a follower that I have been working on for a few hours (mostly messing with the creation kit) that is a auburn haired Nord using Lydia's voice. 

You can find her Markarth at the Silver-Blood Inn. When you do find her she will have a steel dagger, dress and some other items that might add to her character. 

For now I don't know what kind of character to make her, commenting what kind of follower, and where to find her would really be helpful, thanks! 

[b]*And Friend Part* - Note:[/b] I have added a new follower in the 'Sleeping Giant Inn' at Riverwood. His name is "Tralen" and is a Redguard male carrying Steel Plate Armor with a steel sword and a stack of 12 bottles of ale (For when you might need it ;)



[b][i][u]If you don't like the mod please scroll all the way down here....[/u][/i][/b]




















[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][b]You may not like the mod, but I hope you like Comic Sans :)[/b][/size][/font]
author: BlitzZero
